resources.string: Welcome to the world of Pokemon! In this game, you have to find and battle wild Pokemon in order to train your own Pokemon that you catch along the way. Walk with your device and see your character move in real time! Train your pokemon to be strong enough to battle the Elite 4 in order to win the game! Best of luck to you Pokemon trainer!
You have chosen Charmander! Charmander is the fire type pokemon.
You have chosen Squirtle! Squirtle is the water type pokemon.
You have chosen Bulbasaur! Bulbasaur is the grass type pokemon.
Would you like to quit the game?
Thank you for visiting the PokeCenter! Your Pokemon have been restored to full health. We hope to see you again!
